properties.name: Likak deposit, Bahmai County, Kohgiluyeh and Boyer-Ahmad Province, Iran
properties.description:
Likak deposit, Bahmai County, Kohgiluyeh and Boyer-Ahmad Province, Iran

Type: 56

Location: Iran

Celestite mineralization occurs as two northwest-southeast trending beds in the Gachsaran Formation, showing an average dip of 60 toward northeast. The lower celestite bed has a length of 1.5 km, and its thickness decreases from southeast to northwest....

View on Mindat.org
